meanings.definition: Oxidases: enzymes that catalyze oxidation reactions
meanings.sent1: The oxidases in our body help break down food for energy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study oxidases to understand how cells produce energy.
meanings.sent3: The oxidases at the party were the enzymes that made the cake rise!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the oxidases, driving the reaction forward.
meanings.sent5: The oxidases worked tirelessly, like little workers in the cell factory.

meanings.definition: Oxidases: proteins that contain metal ions and catalyze the transfer of electrons from a substrate to oxygen
meanings.sent1: The oxidases in the lab were used to study electron transfer.
meanings.sent2: The oxidases play a crucial role in the electron transport chain.
meanings.sent3: The oxidases at the concert were the real metal stars of the show!
meanings.sent4: His words acted like oxidases, transferring the message clearly.
meanings.sent5: The oxidases danced with electrons, creating a beautiful chemical waltz.
